name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution
A Douyin blogger said that on April 4, 2023, in Hanjiang Village, Shishi City, Fujian Province, three generations of a family were killed by neighbors due to suspected neighborhood conflicts.
The blogger said that afterward, the local government went to the blogger's home to put pressure on his family.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution 
In the video, Rainbow Six players live-stream the game in a way that is almost performance art. It is reported that in the field of game live-streaming in China, the offensive and defensive battle between Rainbow Six players and live-streaming platforms has always been an enduring topic. Because Rainbow Six has been banned from live-streaming for many years, Rainbow Six anchors and players have been using various methods to circumvent live-streaming censorship and develop ways to prevent being identified and judged by AI.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On May 5, a real estate developer in Kunshan City, Jiangsu Province was punished by the government for "disrupting the market and causing social instability" because of price cuts.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
User contribution
Xiamen University has launched a new academic affairs system, where students can report each other's attendance at each class
